summary: Completed comprehensive testing of DataPulse new features: PWA (manifest.json, sw.js), Form Preview (language toggle, device toggle, Test Submit, Reset), and Media Upload API (file limits 10MB/25MB/50MB). All 8 features tested and working correctly.
passed_tests: Media upload API - /api/media/limits returns correct limits (photo 10MB, audio 25MB, video 50MB)
Media upload API - /api/media/upload endpoint accepts files with proper validation
PWA manifest.json - accessible at /manifest.json with correct DataPulse config
PWA service worker - sw.js accessible with proper caching and offline strategies
Form Preview page - loads correctly at /forms/:formId/preview
Form Preview - Language toggle (EN/SW) visible and functional
Form Preview - Device toggle (Mobile/Desktop) visible and functional
Form Preview - Test Submit button visible and clickable
Form Preview - Reset button visible and clickable
Form Preview - Preview Mode badge displayed
Form Preview - Form fields render correctly (text, photo)
Form Preview - Form Data (Debug) panel shows form data
Form Builder - Photo field type available (Camera icon)
Form Builder - Audio field type available (Microphone icon)
Form Builder - GPS Location field type available (MapPin icon)
Form Builder - All 14 field types available in palette
seed_data_creation: Created/updated MobilePayment form with 'Your Name' (text) and 'Take a Photo' (photo) fields for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Three new features fully implemented and tested: 1) PWA with manifest.json and sw.js for offline support, 2) Form Preview page with language toggle (EN/SW), device toggle (mobile/desktop), Test Submit and Reset buttons, 3) Media Upload API at /api/media/upload and /api/media/limits with correct file size limits. Form Builder has all 14 field types including Photo, Audio, and GPS Location.
